meanings.definition: A subdivision or section of a chapter.
meanings.sent1: The book had many interesting subchapters that explained different topics.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the subchapters about animals in science books.
meanings.sent3: The subchapters in the cookbook made me hungry for dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a book with unpredictable subchapters.
meanings.sent5: The subchapters on space exploration were filled with fascinating facts.

meanings.definition: To divide a chapter into smaller sections.
meanings.sent1: The author decided to subchapters the long chapter for better organization.
meanings.sent2: I will subchapters the story to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent3: She wanted to subchapters the day into fun activities.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to subchapters each problem into manageable parts.
meanings.sent5: The teacher will subchapters the lesson into smaller sections for the students.
